channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Framemaker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Framemaker

item.title: CVE-2024-30289|2024-05-16T11:14:22.542Z -- adobe -- adobe%20framemaker
item.description: Adobe Framemaker versions 2020.5, 2022.3 and earlier are affected by a Stack-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
